org.androidtransfuse.layout
Interface LayoutHandlerDelegate

public interface LayoutHandlerDelegate

Interface which defines a manual layout definition call on the Activity in contrast to simply specifying a layout id via the @Layout annotation. A LayoutHandlerDelegate may be injected into, most notably the current Activity may be injected allowing a wide variety of view definitions to be specified. This includes generating the layout problematically or calling a different setContentView() method.

Author:
John Ericksen

          Executes during the onCreate() method in place of the setContentView() call.
